Headline: #18 16th/18th Temporary Reroute at Halsted/18th
ShortDescription: 18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Increased Wait Times on Red Line Service
ShortDescription: Red Line service is running with: residual delays and busier trains/platforms: due to an earlier Cubs game at Addison; crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is running with: residual delays and busier trains/platforms: due to an earlier Cubs game at Addison;

Crews are working to accommodate all passengers and restore normal service as quickly as is possible.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC/Halsted
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#7 Harrison

#8 Halsted

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Clinton
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Clinton due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Clinton due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
